title: Seeing Summoner Names in CLASH!?!
body:

in competitive play you get to see your opponent, you get to scrim against them, you meet them in solo queue. You get to know their champ pools inside and out.

That's what competitive play entails... It's the reason G2 didn't win EU LCS, because they were dumb and let the worlds best Tristana play tristana. 

You can't expect people to not ban out your champion if you are a one trick, this is why one tricking sucks realistically. Expand your champion pool.
